[Plateau Malagasy]: Na izany aza, ireo Belza sy Soisa miteny frantsay dia nianatra ny frantsay iraisana tany am-pianarana, ka afaka mahazo izay lazainao na dia mampiasa ny fomba fanisa frantsay iraisana aza ianao.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Plateau Malagasy]: Tanatin’ny taonjato maro, nanorina lavarangana tsikelikely ny olona, nanorina tanàna teo amin’ny hantsana ka tsy ahitana ranomasina.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Plateau Malagasy]: 800 miles amin’ny Rafitry ny Fantsona Trans-Alaska no nakatona taorian’ny fiparitahana solika tsy voadio an’arivony barika tany amin’ny faritra atsimon’i Fairbanks, any Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Plateau Malagasy]: Ny ampahan’i Belzika amin’izao fotoana izao, izay dia ampahan’i Luxembourg taloha fa lasa Belza taorian’ny revolusiona belza taorian’ny taona 1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Plateau Malagasy]: Hatramin'ny niandohany, lasa manjaka tanteraka eo amin'ny fanaovana dika maneso ny vaovao ny The Onion, miaraka amin’ny dika voatonta, ny tranonkala izay nisarika mpitsidika tsy miverimberina 5.000.000 tao anatin’ny volana Oktobra, ny dokambarotra manokana, ny tambajotram-baovao 24 ora sy ny rakipeo an-tserasera ary ny atlas manerantany vao navoaka vao haingana antsoina hoe Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
